faqs.q: How many calories in 1 cup heavy cream?
faqs.a: Approximately 821 kcal for 1 cup of heavy whipping cream.

faqs.q: What's the fat content in 1 cup heavy cream?
faqs.a: About 88 g total fat, including 55 g saturated fat.

faqs.q: Does heavy cream have carbs or protein?
faqs.a: Roughly 6.6 g carbs (all sugars) and 5 g protein per cup.

faqs.q: How does heavy cream compare to whipping cream?
faqs.a: Heavy cream has higher fat (36-40%) and calories than light whipping cream (30-36%).

faqs.q: Is heavy cream keto-friendly for 1 cup?
faqs.a: Yes, low carbs (6.6 g) but high calories (821 kcal) from fat; portion control advised.
